article_title: Under Pessina, Look For Walgreen To Boost Global Brands

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: The idea behind Alliance Boots' marriage to Walgreens (WAG) was to expand the iconic brands of both companies around the world. But Walgreen under outgoing CEO Greg Wasson became distracted with problems in the U.S. even as it worked to complete its acquisition of Alliance, Europe’s largest drugstore chain. Still, Alliance Boots [...]
